title: Bloomberg Back At The Helm Of His Media Empire
teaser: The Atlantic's Derek Thompson discusses what's behind the decision and what it may mean for the company - and for the former mayor.
contentencoded:
Former New York City Mayor Michael Bloomberg will return to the helm of the company he founded in the 1980s. Derek Thompson of The Atlantic joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to look at what’s behind the decision and what it may mean for the company — and for Bloomberg himself.

Guest

  • Derek Thompson, senior editor at The Atlantic. He tweets @DKThomp.
